page.title: 08HOUSING (2)
page.content: {MIXED DWELLINGS}In some of the roads there are terraced houses with blocks of two story flats set in the middle of them. { {MANSIONS}The only Mansion House in the district was Hale Hall, which is now a ruin and overgrown with creepers, briars, and trees.{ {FARMHOUSES}There are still a few operational farmhouses in th district although some of the others have now been converted into residences for the local population. { {OWNER OCCUPIED}A number of the council houses in the area have been offered for sale to the sitting tenant, and a number of them have now or are taking this opportunity to purchase their property which is offered to them at a much reduced rate, and to alter or add extensions to them.
